behaviors.title: Tickets use TCK-NNNNN ID format with zero-padded five digits
Each ticket is a single YAML file with no separate markdown files
behaviors.description: File naming is TCK-NNNNN.yaml containing all metadata, scope, plan, and criteria in a single file.

behaviors.title: Tickets follow the ticket_meta schema structure
behaviors.description: Schema: standards/schemas/04_ticket_meta.schema.yaml. Sections: ticket, binds, custody, dependencies, scope, plan, definition_of_done, notes.

behaviors.title: Tickets must link to PRD/RFC requirements via binds section
behaviors.description: Each ticket links to PRD/RFC requirements and evidence artifacts through the binds section.

behaviors.title: Ticket completion requires evidence artifact verification
behaviors.description: definition_of_done contains evidence IDs and acceptance criteria that must be verified on completion.
